sentences.en: He always had a yearning to be a schoolteacher.
sentences.cn: 他一直渴望当一名教师。

sentences.en: I am worried for the firefighter. I am worried for the schoolteacher.
sentences.cn: 我为警察感到担忧，为消防队员感到担忧，为教师感到担忧。

sentences.en: Or in the worst case scenario, you just go become a high schoolteacher.
sentences.cn: 最最糟糕的情况是，你可以去做一个高中老师。
